byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and PATRICK HEALY

abstract: Commission on Presidential Debates reports finding that unspecified technical malfunction affected volume of Donald Trump's voice within hall during first debate; while Trump was clearly audible to television audience, his complaints about his microphone appear to have been warranted.
lead_paragraph: The Commission on Presidential Debates said a technical malfunction affected the volume of Mr. Trump’s microphone in the debate hall.
snippet: The Commission on Presidential Debates said a technical malfunction affected the volume of Mr. Trump’s microphone in the debate hall....

headline.main: Actually, a Malfunction Did Affect Donald Trump’s Voice at the Debate
headline.print_headline: Something Was Wrong With Volume, Panel Finds
